definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Was monotheism the religion of our first parents?
sentences.chinese: 是一神教的宗教我們第一次父母？

sentences.english: We are acquiring an understanding of the history of monotheism .
sentences.chinese: 我們最近在瞭解“一神教”的歷史。

sentences.english: Judaism came into being in accordance with monotheism.
sentences.chinese: 猶太民族是因一神教而誕生的民族。

sentences.english: Will monotheistic religions change their idea of the soul to accommodate data?
sentences.chinese: 一神教會爲了適應數據而改變他們對於靈魂的看法嗎？

sentences.english: Van Loon had joined the Unitarian Laymen 's League in 1924.
sentences.chinese: 房龍於1924年加入一神教俗世信徒聯盟。

sentences.english: Some fuckers knew that so they bulit fucking monotheisms.
sentences.chinese: 一些混蛋知道這些所以他們建立了操蛋的一神教。

sentences.english: The God of Socrates was the intermediary of the transformation from polytheism to monotheism.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格拉底的神是多神教向一神教轉變的中介。

sentences.english: Gods start to take on a human form, so monotheism appears around this time.
sentences.chinese: 神靈開始人形化，於是一神教就在這個時候出現了。

definition: theism (the belief in the existence of God)
pantheism, theological theory equating God with the Universe
deism, theological theory of God who does not interfere in the Universe

pinyin: Suo3 luo2 ya4 si1 de2 jiao4
